name: CDurry
short_description: CDurry's goal is to effectively calculate and handle CDC Growth Chart data digitally and graphically. Recent versions are written in C++/GCC for UNIX-like systems and cross-compiled for Win32 binaries (As opposed to original C#/.NET version).

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
